channel.title: Projects on Luka Filipović
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Luka Filipović

item.title: Project VIII: Fuel consumption project
item.description: Created a model that estimates fuel consumption, (MSE ~ 0,61 l/kmh). Scraped almost 15 000 cars and their specification Analyzed parameters that affects on fuel consumption using pandas Visualize fuel consumption based on car specification using matplotlib and seaborn. Created linear model with Tensorflow. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project VII: Amazon book review
item.description: Analyzed positive and negative book reviews, using Natural Proccessing Language, so customers could better understand what can they expect from the book and so the sellers could try to improve their products and adapt to customers preferences. Scraped over 250 reviews of book from Amazon.com using python and selenium Analyzed frequent and keywords from positive and negative reviews Used NLP for analyzing reviews (NLTK library) Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project VI: Estimate apartments price in Zagreb
item.description: Created a model that estimates apartment price in Zagreb, Croatia (RMSE ~ 35 000 €) to help investors decide if building apartment on certain location would be profitable. Scraped over 3000 apartment locations,prices,square meter price,living area etc from crozilla using python and selenium Analyze apartment prices based on location Optimized Linear, Lasso, and Random Forest Regressors using GridsearchCV to reach the best model. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project V: Time Series: Tesla Stock price
item.description: Analyzed closing stock prices of Tesla to give better understanding od stock prices and to see how stock prices changed over day,month or year. Downloaded Tesla stock price from Yahoo finance using python and yfinance Analyzed closing prices by,hours,days,month and year using pandas Visualize closing prices using matplotlib. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project IV: Amazon stock price prediction
item.description: Created a model that predicts stock prices of Amazon (RMSE ~ $ 6 ) to help people decide if buying a stock would be profitable. Download Amazon stock data from Yahoo finance using python and yfinance Analyze close prices by date Using Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) for predicting closing prices Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project III: Bank customer segmentation
item.description: Grouped bank customers based on their annual income and average spending on credit cards per month. Downloaded “Bank_Personal_Loan_Modelling” csv file from world of data Cleaning and exploring dataset using pandas,visualize data using matplotlib and sebaborn Used K-Means for clustering customers based on income and average spending on credit cards per month Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project II: Celebrity image classification
item.description: Created a model that recognize face,with 85.33 % accuracy, of certain celebrity. Downloaded over 50 pictures for each celebrity (overall 5) using Fatkun Batch Analyzing,preparing images using cv2,matplotlib and cascade classifer for eyes and face. Optimized SVM, Logistic Regression, and Random Forest using GridsearchCV to reach the best model. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project I: Bank customer churn
item.description: Created a model that predicts whether will customer leave the bank or not. Downloaded “Churn-Modelling” csv file from data world Analyzed what are reasons for leaving or staying, analyzing customers who left or stayed based on their balance,tenure etc. Balanced training target set with SMOTE. Used RandomForrest and Artificial Neural Network for classification. Link to GitHub Repository
